member.name: T:SimpleSyndicate.Sandcastle.Content.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The namespace contains helper and extension methods for working with content.

member.name: T:SimpleSyndicate.Sandcastle.Content.VersionHistory
member.summary: Provides easy access to the contents of a version history file.

member.name: M:SimpleSyndicate.Sandcastle.Content.VersionHistory.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the file at the specified .
member.param: The version history file to use.

member.name: M:SimpleSyndicate.Sandcastle.Content.VersionHistory.LatestSectionAsText
member.summary: Returns the contents of the latest section as text.
member.returns: The contents of the latest section

member.name: M:SimpleSyndicate.Sandcastle.Content.VersionHistory.NodeAsText(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Returns the contents of the specified as text.
member.returns: The contents of the specified as text.

member.name: M:SimpleSyndicate.Sandcastle.Content.VersionHistory.AddItemToText(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the specified to the specified .
member.returns: The current text with the item added to it.

member.name: M:SimpleSyndicate.Sandcastle.Content.VersionHistory.AddItemSeparatorToText(System.String)
member.summary: Adds an item separator to the text.
member.returns: The current text with an item separator added to it.

member.name: P:SimpleSyndicate.Sandcastle.Content.VersionHistory.Path
member.summary: Gets the path to the version history file.
member.value: Path to the version history file.

member.name: P:SimpleSyndicate.Sandcastle.Content.VersionHistory.FileName
member.summary: Gets the filename of the version history file.

member.name: M:SimpleSyndicate.Sandcastle.Content.VersionHistoryHelpers.VersionHistoryExists(System.String)
member.summary: Returns whether a version history exists in the specified .
member.returns: true if the version history exists; false otherwise.

member.name: M:SimpleSyndicate.Sandcastle.Content.VersionHistoryHelpers.VersionHistoryFilePath(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the version history path for the version history found in the specified .
member.returns: The full path of the version history file.
member.exception: Thrown when no version history file can be found.

member.name: M:SimpleSyndicate.Sandcastle.Content.VersionHistoryHelpers.VersionHistoryFilePathInternal(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the version history file for the version history found in the specified .
member.returns: The full path of the found version history file, or null if it can't be found.

member.name: M:SimpleSyndicate.Sandcastle.Content.VersionHistoryHelpers.DetermineCommonPrefix(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the common prefix in the specified path; this is based on the last directory in the path up to the first period. E.g. for "C:\Some\Path\Test.Project\File.cs" it would be "Test".

member.name: M:SimpleSyndicate.Sandcastle.Content.VersionHistoryHelpers.DetermineProjectName(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the project name in the specified path; this is the last directory in the path.

member.name: M:SimpleSyndicate.Sandcastle.Content.VersionHistoryHelpers.DetermineSearchPath(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the search path from the specified path.

member.name: M:SimpleSyndicate.Sandcastle.Content.VersionHistoryHelpers.Find(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Finds the file with the specified in the specified if it exists in the specified .
member.returns: Path to the file, or null if it can't be found.

member.name: T:SimpleSyndicate.Sandcastle.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The namespace contains helper and extension methods for working with Sandcastle classes.
